languages.text: "Он запятнал тебя. Расколол. Ты — нечистое подобие. Пора признать это".
"He has sullied you. Shattered you. You are an unholy imitation. You should have accepted this by now."
languages.original_text: "Он запятнал тебя. Расколол. Ты — нечистое подобие. Пора признать это".

traits.locale_text: "He has sullied you. Shattered you. You are an unholy imitation. You should have accepted this by now."
"He has sullied you. Shattered you. You are an unholy imitation. You should have accepted this by now."
"He has sullied you. Shattered you. You are an unholy imitation. You should have accepted this by now."
"He has sullied you. Shattered you. You are an unholy imitation. You should have accepted this by now."
"He has sullied you. Shattered you. You are an unholy imitation. You should have accepted this by now."

languages.text: «Le ha mancillado. Destrozado. Es una imitación impía. Debería haberlo aceptado ya».
languages.original_text: "He has sullied you. Shattered you. You are an unholy imitation. You should have accepted this by now."

traits.locale_text: «Le ha mancillado. Destrozado. Es una imitación impía. Debería haberlo aceptado ya».

languages.text: 「あの方はあなたを汚し、粉々にした。あなたは穢れたコピーなのよ。早く事実を受け入れなさい」
languages.original_text: "He has sullied you. Shattered you. You are an unholy imitation. You should have accepted this by now."

traits.locale_text: 「あの方はあなたを汚し、粉々にした。あなたは穢れたコピーなのよ。早く事実を受け入れなさい」

languages.text: “他玷污了你，粉碎了你。你不过是个邪恶的冒牌货而已，你该接受这个事实了。”
languages.original_text: "He has sullied you. Shattered you. You are an unholy imitation. You should have accepted this by now."

traits.locale_text: “他玷污了你，粉碎了你。你不过是个邪恶的冒牌货而已，你该接受这个事实了。”

languages.text: "Er hat Euch besudelt. Gebrochen. Ihr seid eine unheilige Imitation. Das solltet Ihr langsam akzeptieren."
languages.original_text: "He has sullied you. Shattered you. You are an unholy imitation. You should have accepted this by now."

traits.locale_text: "Er hat Euch besudelt. Gebrochen. Ihr seid eine unheilige Imitation. Das solltet Ihr langsam akzeptieren."

languages.text: « Il t'a souillée. Brisée en mille morceaux. Tu n'es qu'une imitation impie. Tu aurais dû l'accepter, depuis le temps. »
languages.original_text: "He has sullied you. Shattered you. You are an unholy imitation. You should have accepted this by now."

traits.locale_text: « Il t'a souillée. Brisée en mille morceaux. Tu n'es qu'une imitation impie. Tu aurais dû l'accepter, depuis le temps. »
